title: CSIROSoilConsignment
description: A set of soil lab results for samples collected for a project.  Data that can be changed through the POST are noted with -- POST at the end of the description.

samples.description: The collection of samples provided in the consignment

agencyId.description: The identifier of the organisation conducting the project (from the CSIRO system)

projectId.description: The identifier of the project (from the CSIRO system)

siteId.description: The identifier of the site (from the CSIRO system)

observationId.description: The identifier of the observation (from the CSIRO system)

horizonId.description: The identifier of the horizon/layer (from the CSIRO system)

sampleId.description: The identifier of the sample (from the CSIRO system)

barcode.description: The field barcode attached to the sample

depthUpper.description: The upper depth that the sample represents in metres from soil surface

depthLower.description: The lower depth that the sample represents in metres from soil surface

receivedDate.description: The date when the lab received the samples for analysis -- POST

viable.description: A boolean indicating if a sample is fit for analysis -- POST

viableComment.description: If a sample is not viable (or present in the consignment), a description of why not viable -- POST

results.description: The collection of soil lab requests / results for this sample

analysisType.description: The type of method used to analyse the result (e.g. chemical, physical, spectra, procedure)

standardProcedureCode.description: The standard procedure code requested for the analysis

requestedProcedureCode.description: The requested procedure code from the laboratory list - if different. This procudere should provide a comparable result to the standard procedure.

result.description: The result of the measurement, including if the result is negative. A prefix symbol defining where a result represents the limit to a procedure, such as less than (<) or greater than (>) or (t) for trace can be included with the result as string. Must be represented in the units of measure (uom) specified in the request. -- POST

resultDate.description: The date when the lab performed the analysis Format: (YYYY-MM-DD) (local) -- POST

uom.description: The units of measurement of the result property. Do not change this value from the one provided.

notes.description: Descriptive conditional text to describe under what conditions (relative to other tests / qualities of the sample) the test should be performed.
